content: the point made hat draws inspiration point made hat from the original melt the ice hat pattern by paul s neary rooted in the tradition of red pointed hats worn by norwegians as a symbol of resistance during the 1940s nazi occupation with a nod to the nisselue the tall santa-like cap with tassels the point made hat carries that spirit of craftivism forward in a knit form that is both striking and expressive 1 ©2026 annarella | web annarella co uk | ig & fb @annarella makes | ravelry annarella | email hello@annarella co uk ingredients finished measurements circumference 44 cm 17 3 height 26 cm 10 excluding i-cord and tassel to fit average adult yarn any aran or worsted weight yarn approx 70g / 230 metres 250 yards yarn used in pattern photos sesia arboris colour #466 berry red this yarn has sadly been discontinued suggested needles 4 mm 40 cm 16 circular and 4mm dpns or a longer circular for magic loop adjust needle size if necessary to obtain correct gauge notions 4 x stitch markers of which 1 unique to indicate bor tapestry needle scissors gauge 21 sts and 28 row = 10 cm 4 in stockinette stitch notes pm place marker due to the type of decreases used in this pattern the stitch marker does not go on needles but it is clasped to the actual stitch this is referred to as marked stitch cdd center double decrease slip two stitches together knitwise as if knitting them together knit the next stitch then pass the two slipped stitches over the knit stitch 2 ©2026 annarella | web annarella co uk | ig & fb @annarella makes | ravelry annarella | email hello@annarella co uk directions when work measures 17 cm 6 7 from co edge brim start the decreases to shape the pointed end co 108 sts using the 1x1 tubular cast on method do not join in the round crown shaping work 4 row of double knit as follows before starting please read note pm on page 2 double knit row 1 * k1 s 1 st wyf * repeat from * to place markers * to end of row turn set-up round k12 pm k24 pm k24 pm k24 pm k12 3 double knit row 2 * s 1 st wyf k1 * repeat from * to additional markers have been placed there are * to end of row turn now 4 markers on the needles repeat double knit row 1 and 2 one more time decreases if you do not want to work the tubular cast on decrease round * k to 1 st before marked stitch cdd * you can use a cast on method of your choice for repeat from * to * three more times k to end of instance the twisted german cast on and skip round 8 sts decrease d the above steps going straight to joining in the work the decreases as follows round
